property.name: viewType
property.label: View type
property.description: Choose the type of layout to use for your featured topics.

property.name: topicFilterList
property.label: Custom Topic IDs
property.description: Add a comma delimited list of topic IDs in the order you wish to display them. The IDs must be for an existing featured topic. Check your browser console for a list of the provided IDs.

property.name: animateHover
property.label: Animate tile hover state
property.description: If checked, will enhance the UI with animations for hover and focus states.

property.name: itemsPerRowSmall
property.label: Items Per Row - Mobile
property.description: Shows this many items in each row for Mobile-sized screens. 'auto' may be useful if the amount of items to be shown aren't divisible by 12.

property.name: itemsPerRowMedium
property.label: Items Per Row - Tablet
property.description: Shows this many items in each row for Tablet-sized screens. 'auto' may be useful if the amount of items to be shown aren't divisible by 12.

property.name: itemsPerRowLarge
property.label: Items Per Row - Desktop
property.description: Shows this many items in each row for Desktop-sized screens. 'auto' may be useful if the amount of items to be shown aren't divisible by 12.

property.name: itemSpacing
property.label: Spacing between items (in px)
property.description: Enter the spacing between items in pixels as an integer. (i.e., '10', for 10 pixels)

property.name: verticalAlignment
property.label: Vertical Text Alignment
property.description: The Vertical alignment of the text in 'Tile' view.

property.name: horizontalAlignment
property.label: Horizontal Text Alignment
property.description: The Horizontal alignment of the text in 'Tile' view.

property.name: imageWidth
property.label: Icon or Image Width
property.description: For 'Tile' or 'Icon' view, enter the width (in px, em, %) of the image you are using

property.name: imageHeight
property.label: Icon or Image Height
property.description: For 'Tile' or 'Icon' view, enter the height (in px, em, %) of the image you are using

property.name: imageBorderRadius
property.label: Border radius of the image
property.description: Use a percentage like '50%' for a circle, or '0px' for a square.

property.name: titleColor
property.label: Topic title color
property.description: Use hex, RGB, or RGBA color values. Leave blank for default.

property.name: titleColorHover
property.label: Topic title color - hover
property.description: Use hex, RGB, or RGBA color values. Leave blank for default.

property.name: hideDescription
property.label: Hide topic description
property.description: If checked, will show the topic description. Long descriptions may cause display issues in 'Tile' view.

property.name: descriptionColor
property.label: Topic description color
property.description: Use hex, RGB, or RGBA color values. Leave blank for default.

property.name: descriptionColorHover
property.label: Topic description color - hover
property.description: Use hex, RGB, or RGBA color values. Leave blank for default.

property.name: hideOverlay
property.label: Hide image overlay
property.description: On the 'Tile' layout, de-selecting will darken the background image in order to increase text contrast and readability.

property.name: overlayColor
property.label: Overlay color
property.description: Use hex, RGB, or RGBA color values. RGBA is best for transparency. Leave blank for default.

property.name: overlayColorHover
property.label: Overlay color - hover
property.description: Use hex, RGB, or RGBA color values. RGBA is best for transparency. Leave blank for default.

property.name: customClass
property.label: Custom Class Name
property.description: Custom CSS class name. Usually remains blank.
